Author: _fidgetspinner
Text: i would not recommend it.   i found minnie maud when i was starting an IOP for anorexia last year. minnie maud gave me the idea that it was basically okay to binge because i was in extreme hunger, but that spiraled quickly into exercise bulimia and then full on binge eating disorder. i do NOT recommend minnie maud for anyone based off of personal experience, and it is also not recommended by any treatment program/ED professional i have seen. i would encourage you to please see a professional that can assess your nutritional needs. they will help you with the mental hunger and will still encourage you to have your favorite foods, as minnie maud does, but in a much healthier way than minnie maud.   anyways... please please please don't do minnie maud and please see a professional instead. good luck in your recovery, i'm rooting for you! ❤️
